ResetTeam

public void ResetTeam()
Places the teams back in their starting positions. Does not affect their threads at all. Called aat the start of new points.

IsPlayerAt

public int IsPlayerAt(java.awt.Point target)
Returns a number from 1 to 4 identifying the player at a given position. It returns 0 if there's no one there.

Parameters:
target - The position being checked.
Returns:
int The player ID at that location

TranslatePlayer

public void TranslatePlayer(BowdoinSoccer.Player target,
                            java.awt.Point Delta)
Tracks player movements for the team.

Parameters:
target - The player moving
Delta - Distance moved in X, Y space.

GetUID

public int GetUID(BowdoinSoccer.Player client)
Returns a unique number used by the blocker to determine the identity of the player. It returns a number from 1 to 8 which corresponds to one of the 8 players in the game. Returns 0 if the player is not on the team.

Parameters:
client - The calling player.
Returns:
int The player's ID.
